dbtools
*******


Description
===========

Use the Database Tools CLI to manage connections, private endpoints,
and work requests in the Database Tools service.


Available Commands
==================

* connection

  * add

  * change-compartment

  * create-database-tools-connection-create-database-tools-connection-
    generic-jdbc-details

  * create-database-tools-connection-create-database-tools-connection-
    postgresql-details

  * create-mysql-database

  * create-oracle-database

  * delete

  * get

  * list

  * remove

  * update-database-tools-connection-update-database-tools-connection-
    generic-jdbc-details

  * update-database-tools-connection-update-database-tools-connection-
    postgresql-details

  * update-mysql-database

  * update-oracle-database

  * validate-database-tools-connection-validate-database-tools-
    connection-postgresql-details

  * validate-mysql-database

  * validate-oracle-database

* endpoint-service

  * get

  * list

* private-endpoint

  * add

  * change-compartment

  * create

  * delete

  * get

  * list

  * remove

  * update

* work-request

  * get

  * list

* work-request-error

  * list

* work-request-log-entry

  * list
